global.invalidResponseExplanation: El servidor devuelve una respuesta inválida.
global.invalidResponsePollingExplanation: El servidor devuelve una respuesta inválida durante la obtención de datos de cartera.
global.unrecognisedPasswordExplanation: La contraseña no fue reconocida. Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo.
global.syncInProgressExplanation: Por favor espera a que la sincronización esté completa.

addAdditionalSeed.seedInvalidCharsExplanation: Las seeds sólo pueden estar compuestas de letras A-Z y el número 9. Tu seed tiene caracteres invalidos. Por favor intenta nuevamente.
addAdditionalSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Las seeds deben tener {{maxLength}} caracteres. Tu seed tiene actualmente {{currentLength}} caracteres. Por favor inténtalo nuevamente.
addAdditionalSeed.nameInUse: Nombre de cuenta ya está en uso
addAdditionalSeed.nameInUseExplanation: Por favor, usa un nombre de cuenta único para tu seed.
addAdditionalSeed.noNickname: Falta ingresar un nombre de la cuenta
addAdditionalSeed.noNicknameExplanation: Por favor ingresa un nombre para la cuenta de tu seed.

changePassword.oopsExplanation: Parece que algo salió mal al actualizar tu contraseña. Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo.
changePassword.passwordUpdatedExplanation: Tu contraseña se ha actualizado con éxito.
changePassword.incorrectPasswordExplanation: La contraseña es incorrecta. Por favor inténtalo de nuevo.
changePassword.passwordsDoNotMatchExplanation: Las contraseñas no coinciden. Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo.
changePassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: La contraseña debe tener al menos 12 caracteres. Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo.
changePassword.oldPassword: No puedes reusar una vieja contraseña
changePassword.oldPasswordExplanation: No puedes reusar la contraseña anterior como una nueva. Por favor inténtalo de nuevo con una distinta.
changePassword.ensureStrongPassword: Asegúrate de utilizar una contraseña segura con al menos 12 caracteres.

copyToClipboard.seedClearedExplanation: The seed has been cleared from the clipboard for your security.
copyToClipboard.seedCopiedExplanation: The seed will be cleared once you press "DONE" or 60 seconds have passed.
copyToClipboard.clickToCopy: Click the button below and copy your seed to a password manager.
copyToClipboard.doNotStore: Do not store your seed in plain text.

enterSeed.invalidCharactersExplanation: Seeds can only consist of the capital letters A-Z and the number 9. Your seed has invalid characters. Please try again.
enterSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seeds must be {{maxLength}} characters long. Your seed is currently {{currentLength}} characters long. Please try again.
enterSeed.seedExplanation: Seeds should be {{maxLength}} characters long, and should contain capital letters A-Z, or the number 9. You cannot use seeds longer than {{maxLength}} characters.
enterSeed.neverShare: NUNCA COMPARTAS TU SEED CON NADIE

login.emptyPasswordExplanation: You must enter a password to log in. Please try again.

loading.loadingFirstTime: Cargando la seed por primera vez.
loading.youMayNotice: You may notice your device slowing down.

newSeedSetup.seedNotGeneratedExplanation: Please click the Generate New Seed button.
newSeedSetup.individualLetters: Pulsa letras individuales para que el proceso sea aleatorio.

onboardingComplete.walletReady: The wallet is now set up and ready to use. If you need to make any changes in the future, look in the Settings menu.

paperWallet.clickToPrint: Pulsa el botón de abajo para imprimir una copia de tu seed.
paperWallet.storeSafely: Almacena tu seed de forma segura.
paperWallet.neverShare: Nunca compartas tu seed con nadie.

receive.addressCopiedExplanation: Your address has been copied to the clipboard.

saveYourSeed.seedClearedExplanation: The seed has been cleared from the clipboard for your security.

seedReentry.incorrectSeedExplanation: The seed you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
seedReentry.thisIsACheck: This is a check to make sure you saved your seed.
seedReentry.ifYouHaveNotSaved: If you have not saved your seed, please go back and do so.

send.invalidAddressExplanation1: Address should be {{maxLength}} characters long and should have a checksum.
send.notEnoughFundsExplanation: You do not have enough IOTA to complete this transfer.
send.keyReuseExplanation: The address you are trying to send to has already been used. Please try another address.
send.invalidAmountExplanation: Please enter a numerical value for the transaction amount.

setPassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Your password must be at least {{minLength}} characters. It is currently {{currentLength}} characters long. Please try again.
setPassword.passwordMismatchExplanation: Las contraseñas introducidas no coinciden. Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo.
setPassword.nowWeNeedTo: Ahora tenemos que configurar una contraseña.
setPassword.anEncryptedCopy: An encrypted copy of your seed will be stored on your device. You will use this password to access your wallet in future.
setPassword.ensure: Asegúrate de utilizar una contraseña segura con al menos 12 caracteres.

setSeedName.canUseMultipleSeeds: You can use multiple seeds with this wallet. Each seed requires an account name.
setSeedName.youCanAdd: You can add more seeds in the Settings menu.

settings.transferSendingExplanation: Please wait until your transfer has been sent.
settings.generatingAddressExplanation: Please wait until your address has been generated.
settings.nicknameChangedExplanation: Your account name has been changed.
settings.accountDeletedExplanation: Your account has been removed from the wallet.
settings.cannotPerformActionExplanation: Go to advanced settings to reset the wallet.

resetWalletConfirmation.warning1: All your wallet data including your
resetWalletConfirmation.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to continue?

resetWalletRequirePassword.enterPassword: Enter password to reset your wallet.

walletSetup.doYouAlreadyHaveASeed: ¿Ya tienes un seed que te gustaría usar?
walletSetup.seedExplanation: Una seed de IOTA funciona simultáneamente como nombre del usuario y contraseña para tu cuenta, combinados en una cadena de 81 caracteres.
walletSetup.explanation1: You can use it to access your funds from
walletSetup.explanation5: . But if you lose your seed, you also lose your IOTA.
walletSetup.keepSafe: Por favor guarda tu seed de manera segura.

welcome.thankYou: Gracias por descargar la cartera de IOTA.
welcome.weWillSpend: Vamos a pasar unos pocos minutos configurando tu billetera.
welcome.reminder: Puede tentarte saltar algunos pasos, pero te sugerimos seguir el proceso completo.

writeSeedDown.yourSeedIs: Your seed is 81 characters read from left to right. Write down your seed and checksum and

history.bundleHashCopiedExplanation: The bundle hash has been copied to the clipboard.
history.addressCopiedExplanation: The address has been copied to the clipboard.
